Translations.Text: allahu yebdeu-lhalka summe yu`iduhu summe ileyhi turce`un
velem yekul lehum min surakaihim suf`au vekanu bisurakaihim kafirin
feemme-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati fehum fi ravdatey yuhberun
veemme-llezine keferu vekezzebu biayatina velikai-l'ahirati feulaike fi-l`azabi muhdarun
velehu-lhamdu fi-ssemavati vel'ardi ve`asiyyev vehine tuzhirun
yuhricu-lhayye mine-lmeyyiti veyuhricu-lmeyyite mine-lhayyi veyuhyi-l'arda ba`de mevtiha. vekezalike tuhracun
